text: Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, was hospitalized Tuesday evening due to an infection caused by a pre - existing condition, according to the BBC. Queen Elizabeth ’ s husband is being monitored at King Edward VII Hospital in London as a precautionary measure, the BBC reports. Last month, the family announced that 96 - year - old Philip will be stepping away from public duties in the fall and begin moving toward retirement. His hospitalization forced him to miss the opening of Parliament on Wednesday. “ Prince Philip is in good spirits and is disappointed to be missing the State Opening of Parliament and Royal Ascot, ” said Buckingham Palace in a statement on Wednesday. “ Her Majesty is being kept informed and will attend Royal Ascot as planned this afternoon. ” As per tradition, the queen gave a speech to Parliament Wednesday morning announcing the government ’
